item.title: 津巴布韦就 210 亿美元违约债务问题聘请顾问
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，津巴布韦政府已经聘请了金融和法律顾问，以帮助其与国际债权人就其所欠的 210 亿美元债务进行谈判。【原文：Zimbabwe’s government has hired financial and legal advisers to help it navigate potential talks with international creditors over the $21 billion it owes, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 亚马逊推出人工智能，帮助送货司机更快找到包裹
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）发布了一款新的人工智能工具，旨在解决其快速送货设备中的一个主要痛点：司机在每一站都要在凌乱的货车中翻找包裹。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. unveiled a new artificial intelligence tool designed to solve a major pain point in its quick delivery apparatus: drivers rummaging through cluttered vans at each stop searching for packages.】

item.title: 投资者权衡政治稳定风险，喀麦隆债券下跌
item.description: 由于对喀麦隆总统健康状况的猜测引发了对潜在继任之争的担忧，喀麦隆美元债券连续第三天下跌。【原文：Cameroonian dollar bonds dropped for a third consecutive day as speculation about the health of the nation’s president raised concerns about a potential succession battle.】

item.title: 罗氏公司首席执行官表示将提高在华生产以满足本地市场需求
item.description: 罗氏控股公司（Roche Holding AG）将增加在中国的生产能力，以服务于中国不断增长的市场，成为随着中美贸易竞争加剧而分拆部分生产的最新一家制药巨头。【原文：Roche Holding AG will add manufacturing capacity in China to serve the country’s growing market, making it the latest pharmaceuticals giant to split some of its production as US-China trade rivalry intensifies.】

item.title: 中央银行调查显示印度通胀预期放缓
item.description: 在最新的央行季度调查中，印度家庭的通胀预期有所缓解，这为政策制定者考虑降息提供了进一步的理由。【原文：Inflation expectations among Indian households eased in the latest central bank quarterly survey, giving policymakers further reason to consider interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 利比亚石油复苏给欧洲原油市场带来压力
item.description: 利比亚石油出口的恢复对从北海到地中海的原油价格造成压力。【原文：The return of Libyan oil exports is pressuring crude prices from the North Sea to the Mediterranean.】

item.title: KKR 就交易审查问题与司法部发生争执，私募股权投资公司凶多吉少
item.description: KKR & Co.和美国司法部正在争吵，因为美国当局正在深化对私募股权投资行业的审查，要求该公司的高管在与收购相关的信息披露方面承担更多责任。【原文：KKR & Co. and the Justice Department are sparring over a push to hold the firm’s top executives more accountable for disclosures related to takeovers, as US authorities deepen their scrutiny of the private equity industry.】

item.title: 反弹势头减弱，比尔-格罗斯建议转向防御型股票
item.description: 比尔-格罗斯（Bill Gross）认为，过去五年来帮助美股价值几乎翻番的涨势正在减弱，投资者应该期待低但积极的投资回报。【原文：The rally that’s helped US stocks almost double in value over the past five years is tapering off, and investors should expect low but positive returns on their investments, according to Bill Gross.】

item.title: VanEck 与前 Circle 员工创办加密货币和人工智能风险基金
item.description: VanEck 是一家资产规模约为 1,150 亿美元的资产管理公司，该公司正在进军风险投资领域，将设立一支 3,000 万美元的早期基金，重点关注金融科技、数字资产和人工智能初创企业。【原文：VanEck, a roughly $115 billion asset manager, is entering the world of venture capital investing with a $30 million early-stage fund that will focus on fintech, digital assets and artificial-intelligence startups.】

item.title: LendingClub 和 Pagaya 合作从已倒闭的信用卡公司购买技术
item.description: LendingClub Corp. 和 Pagaya Technologies Ltd. 同意联合收购现已倒闭的 Tally Technologies Inc.【原文：LendingClub Corp. and Pagaya Technologies Ltd. agreed to jointly buy the intellectual property behind the now-shuttered Tally Technologies Inc., which helped consumers and businesses manage credit-card debt.】

item.title: 人工智能对电力的渴求让公用事业股成为大型科技股的代名词
item.description: 科技界对人工智能的痴迷正在继续刺激对电力的巨大需求；这将为公用事业部门带来更高的回报率，并撼动 S&P 500 指数。华尔街认为，未来还会有更多。【原文：The tech world’s obsession with artificial intelligence is continuing to spur a huge demand for power — supercharging returns in the utilities sector and shaking up the S&P 500 index. Wall Street sees more to come.】

item.title: 战争风险飙升，石油面临 2022 年以来最坎坷的一个月开局
item.description: 由于伊朗和以色列之间的紧张局势不断升级，油价出现了近两年来波动最大的一个月。【原文：Oil prices have seen their most volatile start to a month in almost two years as the spiraling tensions between Iran and Israel spur a bumper bout of volatility.】

item.title: 华尔街的海湾繁荣面临伊朗-以色列紧张局势的风险
item.description: 华尔街巨头纷纷涌入中东，希望从该地区巨大的石油财富中分得一杯羹，但伊朗和以色列之间不断升级的紧张局势又带来了新的不确定性。【原文：Wall Street giants have been flocking to the Middle East for a slice of the region’s vast oil wealth, but escalating tensions between Iran and Israel are throwing up new uncertainties.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长 Wunsch 警告快速减息，10 月仍未决定：回声报
item.description: 据比利时《回声报》报道，欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员皮埃尔-翁施（Pierre Wunsch）告诫人们不要过快降低利率，并表示他对人们普遍预期的本月降息尚未作出决定。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Pierre Wunsch cautioned against interest rates being lowered too quickly and said he’s undecided on a widely expected cut this month, according to Belgium’s L’Echo.】

item.title: 欧洲将迎来禁止俄罗斯供应以来最大的海运柴油进口量
item.description: 由于美国柴油进口量激增，同时沙特阿拉伯也有大量柴油运抵欧洲，欧洲本月将迎来柴油进口潮。【原文：Europe is poised for a deluge of diesel imports this month as a surge in shipments from US coincides with super-sized cargo arrivals from Saudi Arabia.】

item.title: 美联储坚持软着陆，Pimco 建议购买五年期债券
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Investors who expect central banks in industrialized nations to successfully tap the brakes on growth while skirting downturns would do well to target five-year bonds, according to Pacific Investment Management Co.】

item.title: 肯尼亚总统任命 Munyori Buku 为通讯部主任
item.description: 肯尼亚总统威廉-鲁托（William Ruto）在 X 日的一份声明中说，总统府任命芒约里-布库（Munyori Buku）为总统通信处处长。【原文：Kenyan President William Ruto appointed Munyori Buku as head of the presidential communication service, the presidency said in a statement on X.】

item.title: 德国经济连续第二年萎缩
item.description: 德国政府将今年的国内生产总值预期下调至萎缩 0.2%，这是欧洲最大经济体正在努力摆脱长期惰性的最新迹象。【原文：The German government revised down its gross domestic product forecast for this year to a contraction of 0.2%, the latest sign Europe’s biggest economy is struggling to shake off a prolonged period of inertia.】

item.title: 马克龙希望法国媒体公司留在巴黎：综合报道
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）表示，他更希望法国媒体公司在巴黎而不是其他地方进行交易，因为法国维旺迪公司（Vivendi SE）表示，作为拆分集团计划的一部分，该公司倾向于将付费电视业务部门Canal+在伦敦上市。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron said he would prefer French media companies be traded in Paris rather than elsewhere, as France’s Vivendi SE says it’s leaning toward listing pay-TV unit Canal+ in London as part of a plan to break up the conglomerate.】

item.title: 摩根大通预计 2024 年欧洲、中东和非洲地区新兴市场债券销售额将创历史新高
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）预计，即使11月美国总统大选和中东紧张局势升级可能导致市场动荡，欧洲、中东和非洲新兴市场的债券销售在今年年底仍将创下纪录。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. expects bond sales from emerging markets in Europe, the Middle East and Africa to close the year at a record, even with potential market turbulence due to US presidential elections in November and escalating tensions in the Middle East.】

item.title: 在阿特拉斯首席执行官离职前，阿波罗对银行的赌注遭遇挫折
item.description: 这笔交易具有华尔街不可避免的权力转移的所有特征：阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：The deal had all the hallmarks of Wall Street’s inevitable power shift: Apollo Global Management Inc., king of the rising non-bank lenders, seizing on weakness at Credit Suisse Group AG to snatch up one of the Swiss firm’s most lucrative businesses.】

item.title: KKR 旗下的 BMC 将分拆为两家私营软件公司
item.description: KKR & Co.旗下的企业技术供应商 BMC Software 将拆分为两家独立公司。【原文：BMC Software, a KKR & Co.-owned technology provider for businesses, is breaking up into two standalone companies.】

item.title: 美国平均 FICO 分数在十年来首次下降后保持稳定
item.description: 美国消费者的平均信用评分在经历了十年来的首次滑坡后已趋于稳定。【原文：The average consumer credit score in the US has steadied after its first slip in a decade.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行蓝湾分行认为特朗普和哈里斯的政策有可能助推美联储加息
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行蓝湾资产管理公司（RBC BlueBay Asset Management）首席投资官马克-道丁（Mark Dowding）认为，考虑到两位美国总统候选人的通胀政策纲领，美联储明年有可能不得不加息。【原文：There is a risk the Federal Reserve has to raise interest rates next year given the inflationary policy platforms of both US presidential candidates, according to Mark Dowding, the chief investment officer at RBC BlueBay Asset Management.】

item.title: 印度金达尔公司放弃与委内瑞拉国家石油公司（PDVSA）的石油合资企业
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，金达尔电力有限公司（Jindal Power Ltd. ）正在退出一家合资企业，该企业将为委内瑞拉国家控制的原油生产商运营石油加工设施。【原文：Jindal Power Ltd. is walking away from a venture that would have operated an oil-processing facility for Venezuela’s state-controlled crude producer, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 尼日利亚将为丹格特原油销售设定奈拉市场汇率
item.description: 尼日利亚将在其外汇市场上使用当地货币汇率结算向非洲最新、最大炼油厂出售的原油，从而消除了人们对尼日利亚将以低于市场水平的奈拉进行交易的担忧。【原文：Nigeria will settle crude sales to Africa’s newest and biggest oil refinery using the local currency’s rate in its foreign-exchange market, dousing concerns that it would fix below-market naira levels for the transactions.】

item.title: Byju 创始人称失踪的数百万美元用于合法目的
item.description: Byju's曾是一家风光一时的印度教育公司，但该公司拖欠了美国债务，其创始人否认自己策划了一项骗取贷款人 5.33 亿美元的计划。【原文：The founder of Byju’s, a once high-flying Indian education company that defaulted on its US debts, denied that he orchestrated a scheme to fraudulently transfer $533 million away from lenders.】

item.title: 中国经济复兴的漫漫长路才刚刚开始
item.description:
刺激经济的热潮已经褪去。这也许不是一件坏事—只要 北京听话。【原文：

The stimulus excitement has faded. That may not be a bad thing — provided Beijing listens.

】

item.title: 贸易商听到关税威胁，但质疑什么才是真正的威胁
item.description: 迪尔公司习惯于成为一种政治象征，其标志性的黄色和绿色拖拉机和割草机是美国中心地带的有力象征，也是美国人喜欢看到自己的标志。【原文：Deere & Co. is used to being a political symbol, with its iconic yellow and green tractors and lawn-mowers serving as powerful emblems of America’s heartland and how the country likes to see itself.】

item.title: 财政部主管称西班牙投资者需求非常强劲
item.description: 西班牙财政部部长保拉-孔特（Paula Conthe）说，西班牙目前正处于一个甜蜜的时刻，因为西班牙的经济增长速度超过了地区同行，投资者纷纷涌入西班牙举债。【原文：Spain is currently in a sweet spot as its growth outstrips regional peers and investors pile into its debt, the head of Spain’s Treasury Paula Conthe said.】
